category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 42 (Creation and management of a pleasant working environment)
contents: Article 42 (Creation and management of a pleasant working environment) ① The chairman must manage the place where workers work to ensure that ventilation, lighting, lighting, insulation, moisture prevention, cleanliness, etc. are maintained at an appropriate level, and waste can only be disposed of in designated places. Measures must be taken to ensure that Revised 2021. 12. 22., 2022. 12. 16., ② The chairman shall strive to improve the workplace environment according to the characteristics of workers, such as their gender, age, or physical conditions. Revised December 16, 2022, ③ The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall endeavor to provide rest facilities that workers can use during break times to help them relieve job stress. Revised December 16, 2022, ④ The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall install the rest facilities under paragraph 3 in a place separate from places that emit dust harmful to the human body or places that handle hazardous substances.
